trans-unit.source: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.
trans-unit.target: 表示 C14N XML 規範化轉換數位簽章 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所定義的註解。

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform 類別代表描述 XML 文件的標準格式 C14N XML 規範化轉換。

trans-unit.source: This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 此轉換允許來建立使用 XML 文件的標準格式摘要簽署。

trans-unit.source: A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform.
trans-unit.target: 收件者接著可確認數位簽章和相同的轉換使用相同的標準格式的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要登入包含註解的 XML 文件時，請使用 XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform 類別。

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您無法直接建立規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定規範化轉換，將說明要轉換的統一資源識別元 (URI)<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>屬性，這是從存取<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得規範化轉換的參考，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>屬性，這是從存取<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field.

The URI that describes the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: 描述 XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform 類別的 URI 由定義<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>欄位和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用註解 C14N 轉換，請參閱章節 6.5 和 6.6.1 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。

trans-unit.source: The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n.
trans-unit.target: 標準化演算法被定義在 W3C 標準 XML 規格中，將會位於 www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"></xref>類別。
